au.com.agic.apptesting.utils

Interface BrowserInteropUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrowserInteropUtilsImpl

    public interface BrowserInteropUtils
    We need to test for certain conditions between the various browsers to account for compatibility issues.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • treatElementAsHidden

        boolean treatElementAsHidden(@NotNull
                             org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver,
                             @NotNull
                             org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                             @NotNull
                             org.openqa.selenium.JavascriptExecutor js)
        PhantomJS has issues with and elements. This check determines if we need to treat the element as hidden, which means that we'll use javascript to click them instead of the webdriver.
        Parameters:
        webDriver - The selenium webdriver
        element - The element to check
        js - The javascript executor (which may or may not be the same object as webDriver)
        Returns:
        true if we need to treat this element as hidden, and false otherwise

                            @NotNull
                            java.lang.String selectElement)
        Deals with inconsistencies between browsers in how they select items from a drop down list
        Parameters:
        webDriver - The selenium webdriver
        element - The drop down list
        selectElement - The item that we want to select
